Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Blowgun = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
part = Instance.new("Part") part.Size = Vector3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8) part.Transparency = 0.0 part.CanCollide = false
local fieldMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") fieldMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" fieldMesh.Name = "Mesh" fieldMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=51319089" fieldMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=51229975" fieldMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2, 1.2, 1.2) fieldMesh.Parent = part
local BlowgunSound
function shoot(pos)
vCharacter = Tool.Parent
if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then print("Player not found") return end
randomize = math.random(1, 100)/ 100
for i =1, 3 do
BlowgunSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("BlowgunSound") if BlowgunSound then BlowgunSound:Play() end
local dart = part:Clone()
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position + Vector3.new((i-1)%2 * randomize, (i-1)%2 * randomize, (i-1)%2 * randomize) spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 5.0
dart.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) dart.Velocity = pos * 75.0 dart.Name ="dart" dart.Parent = game.Workspace dart.CanCollide = false
local dartFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") dartFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, dart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) dartFloat.Parent = dart
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Parent = dart
local newScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("OnTouchScript"):Clone() newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = dart
debris:addItem(dart, 5) wait(0.2) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then print("Torso not found") return end
Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-0.5, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (target - vCharacter.Head.Position).unit wait(0.5) shoot(lookAt) wait(1.0)
Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if BlowgunSound then BlowgunSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local dart = script.Parent
creatorTag = dart:FindFirstChild("creator")
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouch(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then dart:Remove() HitSound:Play() creatorTag.Parent = humanoid humanoid:TakeDamage(30) wait(1.0) creatorTag:Remove() wait(0.5) script:Remove() end end
dart.Touched:connect(onTouch)

local Tool = script.Parent local Blowgun = Tool.Handle
local blowAnim local vCharacter
function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
blowAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Blow)
if blowAnim then blowAnim:Play() end
end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if blowAnim then blowAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
